summary: This is the Metropolitan Correctional Center's daily lieutenant's log for July 7, 2019, documenting routine prison operations and counts across three shifts. The log notes inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was removed from his cell to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at 7:20 PM. The document is significant as it records prison activity on the day before Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054. The log records he was removed from his cell to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at 7:20 PM on July 7, 2019.

events.title: Epstein moved to Special Housing Unit
events.description: At 7:20 PM, inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was removed from his cell to the Special Housing Unit (SHU), as recorded in the Evening Watch log.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
Local Hosp (Local Hospital referenced in sensitive information)
keyFacts: The log documents prison operations on July 7, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was moved to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at 7:20 PM on July 7, 2019.
The log indicates one inmate was at a local hospital with USMS (U.S. Marshals Service) guards throughout all three shifts.
Prison counts remained stable at 790 total inmates with 75-76 in SHU across the day.
The document shows routine security checks including body alarm tests, metal detector checks, and NYPD phone verifications.
